column5: Hehe, I like to play the game here and there. I've had it for about 3 weeks and I just got the 5 hour playing time notice. So that tells you how much I play. But I do enjoy playing it as the day winds down. Of course I don't skip work or school to play, And while my girlfriend is home from school Thursday to Sunday, the game system doesn't get touched.
It's also more of a winter season thing for me. Once you can put shorts on you won't catch me in the house. I'll be on the boat or on the bike.
I'm on PS3.  "STOTY" is my PSN name. Feel free to add me.
dont get me started on the PS vs Xbox and BattleField vs COD cause I will destroy you all in an argument. I get heated about this stuff.
I play cod4. Im 11th prestige hahah
Thinking about getting black ops off my buddy tomorrow since I just got my hd projector lamp replaced yesterday

YES!!! BFBC 2 is the best first person military shooting game out there! COD is so cartoonish and the guns sound so weird! I have all COD games for PS3 since COD 4 but I only buy them to try them and so far nothing beats Bad Company 2, so they sit there and collect dust. If anyone plays BFBC 2 online, feel free to add me on PS3! My ID is: superdeluxe639

No worries man, it's all just an opinion. Some people like Battlefield better than COD, and PS3 more than XBOX. It's just a matter of opinion, not fact. Whatever you like better is your choice as long as you enjoy it, that's all that matters. Although the only matter of fact is that BFBC 2 is better than any COD ;P Kidding, that's just my opinion, I enjoy the game way more. But then again, I own a sound recording and post-production studio as a business, and we do post-production sound mixing for film and television, and the occasional video game trailer, and I'll tell you for certain that the sound in BFBC 2 is FAR superior to COD. That doesn't make it better for everyone, perhaps that's why I like it better, but hey to each their own...
You may be on the wrong forum then Bud!

I come home to the sounds of gunfire everyday....so I head to the liquor cabinet and then I blast my Dean Martin.  I tried XBOX360 once, had my man spinning like a ballet dancer, twas quite comical.  My son is addicted he truly is and its quite sad.  He needs to get a JOB, a life, away from that life sucking machine!!  Someday I may just accidentally take a hammer to it....and blame him for driving me mad with the constant sounds of war.
I used to have a couple buddies big into the online shooter games. I'm sure they're probably still in their mothers basements playing right now...LOL
you need to get out a bit more if you get into heated arguments about video games...

considering how many kids are obese, lazy, antisocial and unwilling to work because of video games, i highly recommend that you smash that thing before your kid turns into one of those people i make fun of.  a few of my buddies have younger siblings that got hooked on video games and it's rather pathetic how low some people can go. never leave the house, 8 hours of game play a day, skipping school, no friends, 18 and never had girlfriends, etc. what makes it even worse is their parents just sit back and let it happen. put your foot down and put a time limit on daily usage.

Yep, guys at worked got me hooked on Modern Warfare and now BlackOps.  Usually get my ass shot off but its a lot of fun.  Find the servers on PS3 are flakey, but its free so cant complain.  Between seasons it passes the time as opposed to watching the boob tube
I'm with you Lew. I've heard of pac-man but never played it...
11th prestige!!!  How did you put the controller down long enough to post!?!? lol  i'm on to "lovetofish"
Here's what I grew up on.......  Ahhhh......the good ole days !!!  In some cases......a quarter got you two plays!!

Im calling Bull on this !!!!! over 30 days of play time ???? that would mean you average 5 and a half hours of play time a day SINCE the game came out in november.... I cant remember exactly, but I think it came out Nov. 9th.  Bragging about how much time you waste inside isnt "COOL" ... and if infact you can prove that number, its even more pathetic !  I have seen guys with 10-12-15 days play time with top prestige.  On the other hand.... Black ops is pretty sweet, I have about 6 days play time now. Im on 4th prestige. Im kind of losing interest now though. Ive got a house to renovate, work to be done and fish to catch !!!!  See ya on the water !   PS.... PS3 rules all !!!! hands down !
He should be on the 50th prestige about 6 times by now if he is still playin COD4 !!!!! Its been out for what... 3 years now ?
It's still the best call of duty imo
Yeah whatever. As far as I'm concerned anyone over the age of 12 who plays these things needs to get a life.

gotta disagree with you on this statement...i'm 26 with a job, home, wife and newborn baby...i do plenty through the day that doesnt involve a gaming system...if i want to sit down for an hour or 2 and play some COD after the wife and baby have gone to bed, i dont see any problem with that nor do i feel like i need to get a life
I'm with Meely... here's my basement time piece.
Each day that goes by I'm morphing more and more into Walter Matthau.
Welcome to the club, Mike. If you've seen "On Golden Pond", I'm the old poop.

I am in the same boat except I am 34. Beats the hell out of watching survivor  or any of the garbage television programming.  I do not watch tv anymore.  I either read books or essays or I lose myself in a game for a bit.  And as it happens, I personally believe that it has helped me professionally.  I am a Crane operator by trade but sometimes run other machines.  My learn time on different machines over the years probably was cut in half at least.
Anyone  onn the board play?

Played 'em all except the newest one. I only play solo, not online. They're fun. My problem is I get them as hand me downs from my son so some are on the PC and some are on his old XBox which he gave me when he got the newer XBox360. He also has PS but I haven't got a handmedown of that yet.  JF
Does Intelevision Pong count?
I was going to say I've never played a video game in my life.  But I did play that 30 years ago.
Xbox is where the competition's at! I personally prefer MWF2 over BlackOps, but that didn't stop me from lining up midnight at Dundas Best Buy.  Less COD more fishing!
I am playing Killzone3. Great game.  I like it better than black ops.
I have a wii
I call Bull on this one!!!!! What about your kids wii with the fishing game on it?
Buddy I can't even hook the thing up.  I watched them play a couple times when they first got it. They havn't touched it once since we moved in July.  Biggest waste of money ever.
i play it all the time on my 360 great game and lots of fun, but is VERY addicting
I'm always at least ten years behind on this electronic stuff so I'm still playing it on my PS2.

I prefer not to play with hackers and lag-switchers, therefore I play on the 360. The only games I buy for the PS3 are exclusives like KZ, MGS, Gran Turismo. Honestly, I haven't bought a game for the PS3 in over a year, it's only ever used for watching blu-rays now.
Last machine I bought was an Atari with games like Space Invaders, Missile Command and Pacman. Somewhere back in the late 70's? I do play fish claw extreme online.
Jeeeez, I must be gettin old cause I have no idea what any of those things your talking about  are
gran turismo 5 is the only game i play.  my ps3 is a blue-ray otherwise
I had to get up at 2.00am for a wii
have over 30 days of playing time on EACH COD since COD4! Highest prestige in all of them. Time to stop and get a life. ON XBOX tho
My son plays them all, including black ops. But dont ask me anything about them, i only pay for them.
You and me are in the same boat!

I have MW2 for PC and MW2+Black ops for PS3...but spend more time playing on PC than PS3...cuz I am so used to the mouse from playing Counter-Strike (one of the best game of all time!) Being a CS pro makes MW2 so easy to handle...for real!
I wish I had gone xbox360...
Add me to your friends lists if you play on ps3 my psn name is cwpowell
xbox 360 is a joke .ps3 is way better blu ray built in free internet better games less annoying children everybody i know who bought a 360 sold it and got a ps3 .far superior system
well, you've convinced me...im going to buy a ps3 right now!
battlefield bad company 2 is far better than any COD...
